In "development" branch, install xsdk on NERSC Edison has been failing with a build issue of Atlas.  
```
spack install xsdk%gcc@6.1.0
```
As far as I know, Spack had a problem with suing Cray-LibSci product for LAPACK and BLAS.  Is this still unresolved?   

This is part of error output from Atlas.
